column1: Advanced Master in Innovative Health Technology (Leuven)
column5: Today, there is a growing, global industry developing novel technologies to further advance modern health care. This advanced master’s programme enables students to specialise in this domain, as they learn to design, develop and implement technological solutions for the healthcare sector.About the programmeThe development of novel technologies has long been a key driver in the advancement of modern health care. Technologies that better enable medical doctors, therapists and other careproviders to identify symptoms, perform diagnoses, carry out surgery, cure diseases, programme therapy and follow up patients’ progress.
column7: Please consult the website for recent information on tuition fees: kuleuven.be/tuitionfees
